entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is given homework by Snape to write an essay on the correct composition of a potion.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Severus Snape, a potions master at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He gives homework to Harry Potter to write an essay on the correct composition of a potion.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is given homework by Snape to write an essay on the correct composition of a potion.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She tells Harry that he cannot skip Divination class.

relationships.description: Snape assigns homework to Potter, which is to write an essay on the correct composition of a potion.
Hermione prevents Potter from skipping Divination class by telling him that he cannot do so.
